alert.note: Alert for Surprise Valley California (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 5:10AM PST until December 14 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * CHANGES...Updated additional snow totals for current advisory. * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Surprise Valley California and Northern Washoe County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Even lighter snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since it takes longer to stop on slick roadways. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
